long_description: Attractive and sturdy, the Byer Pangean folding table travels easily from the backyard to the beach. Made from keruing wood, a strong, durable hardwood. Wood is handcrafted then oil finished before being assembled, offering an attractive look. Folding table collapses to 24 x 17 x 4 in., allowing it to stow away in the garage or slide easily into the back of a car. Byer Pangean folding table sets up quickly and easily.
short_description: Attractive and sturdy, the Byer Pangean folding table travels easily from the backyard to the beach.
